div.div: Activity of birds in forest types per species (a) for plots and (b) for food types.
div.p: Any gray shaded area (scale on right hand side) indicates activity ln( A); white indicates zero counts for plot. Species codes: BT–Blue Tit; Ch–Chaffinch; CoT–Coal Tit; CrT–Crested Tit; EB–Eurasian Bullfinch; EJ–Eurasian Jay; EN–Eurasian Nuthatch; GSW–Great Spotted Woodpecker; GT–Great Tit; MT–Marsh Tit; WT–Willow Tit.
